content:
Cloud Native Days Los Angeles is colocated with the Southern California Linux Expo (SCaLE). The event will be held at the Pasadena Convention Center in Pasadena, California on March 6-7, 2025.
The event will feature a mix of talks, workshops, and networking opportunities focused on open source and cloud native practices.
Registration, call for proposals (CFP), and scheduling is handled by SCaLE. For more information and to register, visit the SCaLE website.
title: Los Angeles

content:
The Cloud Native Days events are community run, global events with a wide variety of topics. Many events were previously part of Kubernetes Community Days or other Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) events.
Cloud Native Days was created to provide a common place for localized events to find their communities.
title: About Cloud Native Days
